title.rendered: Roxel RX110 Powerful Bass Lightweight Wired Foldable Headphones with Mic, Ergonomic On Ear Headphone Compatible with…

content.rendered:
Roxel RX-110

Roxel RX 110 comes with snug reminiscence foam mushy leather-based earpads. Its ergonomic light-weight on-ear design makes this headset snug for long-time carrying. High-quality sound from two 40 mm driver models. Features adaptive sound expertise producing precision audio for each style. High-quality built-in microphone for hands-free calls. 1.5 m headphone cable with gold plated Stereo 3.5 mm L formed plug permitting further motion.

Lightweight

Its ergonomic light-weight on-ear design makes this headset snug for lengthy listening classes.

Built-in microphone

High-quality built-in microphone for hands-free calls.

Read more

Two-way foldable design, flat and compact for portability. Easily take them anyplace you go.

Read more

Details

  • Connector sort: 3.5mm Jack
  • Headphones Jack: 3.5 mm
  • Item Weight: 160 Grams
  • Control Type: Call Control
  • Frequency Response: 15 Hz – 20 okHz.
  • Water Resistance Level: Not Water Resistant
  • Material: Leather + plastic

Compatibility & Sound Quality

Superior sound on all of your gadgets

  • Compatible with Android and iOS media gadgets similar to iPod, iPad, Android Phones, Android MP3 gamers.

  • High-quality sound is set by two 40 mm driver models with adaptive sound expertise which produces precision audio output for each style.

Read more

6 Beautiful colors

Express your fashion with 6 totally different colors to selected from.

Black, white, blue, purple, pink & rainbow

Read more

Designed in Essex

Here at Roxel, we’ll by no means faucet into your sensitives and promise you youth or happiness, however we’ll all the time provide consistency and dedication. We are primarily based in Essex, every product is rigorously designed and crafted to the shoppers’ want. Roxel is a registered UK model and all items are equipped to your door from UK primarily based warehouses.

20 Years expertise

Roxel is constructed on a bedrock of expertise, simplicity, belief and ardour to ship above and past the expectations in an over-crowded and noisy world of electronics. With over 20 years of expertise within the discipline, we aren’t providing low cost and cheerful as a substitute, we’re promising the most effective of what we will obtain, reasonably priced high quality.

Read more

Make certain this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Roxel RX110 function padded reminiscence foam earcups for final consolation, its ergonomic light-weight on ear design making this headset snug for lengthy listening classes.
High-quality sound in these are decided by two 40 mm driver models with adaptive sound expertise which produces precision audio output for each style.
Frequency Response: 15 Hz – 20 okHz. Compatible with all Android and iOS media gadgets similar to iPod, iPad, Android Phones, Android MP3 gamers.
Two approach foldable design, flat and compact for portability. Roxel RX 110 can be utilized as gaming headphones, sports activities headphones, youngsters headphones, health club headphones in addition to working headphones.
High high quality inbuilt microphone for arms free calls. 1.5 m headphone cable with gold plated Stereo 3.5 mm L formed plug permitting further motion.
